name: GlobalVars
description: Provides a way to store and share variables between different scripts and contexts.
overview: Provides a way to store and share variables between different scripts and contexts (e.g., from a script to a custom GUI). Accessible from scripts via the global `GlobalVars` variable. Also contains a `globalRaw` field (`java.util.Map<string, any>`) regarding the raw map storage.

methods.name: putInt
methods.description: Stores an integer value associated with a specific name.

methods.name: putString
methods.description: Stores a string value associated with a specific name.

methods.name: putDouble
methods.description: Stores a double value associated with a specific name.

methods.name: putBoolean
methods.description: Stores a boolean value associated with a specific name.

methods.name: putObject
methods.description: Stores an arbitrary object associated with a specific name.
examples:
const playerPos = { x: 10, y: 64, z: -20 };
GlobalVars.putObject("last_pos", playerPos);

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Retrieves the Java class name of the stored object.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the variable to check.

methods.name: getInt
methods.description: Retrieves an stored integer value by name.

methods.name: getAndIncrementInt
methods.description: Increments an integer variable and returns the value before incrementing.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the integer variable.

methods.name: getAndDecrementInt
methods.description: Decrements an integer variable and returns the value before decrementing.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the integer variable.

methods.name: incrementAndGetInt
methods.description: Increments an integer variable and returns the new value.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the integer variable.

methods.name: decrementAndGetInt
methods.description: Decrements an integer variable and returns the new value.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the integer variable.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a stored string value by name.

methods.name: getDouble
methods.description: Retrieves a stored double value by name.

methods.name: getBoolean
methods.description: Retrieves a stored boolean value by name.

methods.name: toggleBoolean
methods.description: Toggles the boolean state associated with the name and returns the new value.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the boolean variable.

methods.name: getObject
methods.description: Retrieves a stored object by name.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the variable with the specified name.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The name of the variable to remove.

methods.name: getRaw
methods.description: Retrieves the raw underlying Java Map that stores all global variables.
